rules_text: Destroy target creature. Its controller obscures the top card of their library.
rules_text2:
Levinthrull Crypts enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Levinthrull Crypts: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
